channel.title: PocketDjVu updates notification.
channel.description: If you want to keep up to date PocketDjVu installed on your handheld PC you could subscribe on this feed.

item.title: The PocketDjVu 0.9.4.0 is released.
item.description: The changes made in 0.9.4.0 version you can find here Note! Two new modes of virtual memory usage were added. I would like to stress that there are no miracles in the computing and virtual memory permits to have extra big zoom factor but on account of time. So I don't recommend to use virtual memory in the 2nd mode (i.e. "Bmp+DjVu") but only in extreme needs.

item.title: The PocketDjVu 0.9.3.3 is released.
item.description: The changes made in 0.9.3.3 version you can find here

item.title: PocketDjVu RSS feed is launched.
item.description: From now you can be informed about latest PocketDjVu releases with help of this RSS feed.
